name: Religious Crystals
description:
This game was made in 72 hours for Krass Jam 4 with the theme : A game where you collect crystals from spaceships through religion.

Collect religion by buying and upgrading planets. Trade that religion for some sweet purple crystals. Use those crystals to upgrade you planets even more!! Or just buy new space ships from the shop.

*Note* The volume is set to zero by default so go into settings to turn it up.

Credits:

  • Art - Not A Bot
  • Sound - Not A Bot
  • Programming - Not A Bot
